headline: No-Bake Cookies
description: These no-bake cookies are incredibly quick to make with oats, creamy peanut butter, and cocoa for a chocolaty treat without having to heat the oven!

video.description: See how to make tasty no-bake cookies with oatmeal, peanut butter, and cocoa.
video.name: No Bake Cookies I

name: No-Bake Cookies

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar, butter, milk, and cocoa in a medium saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring often. Boil for exactly 1 1/2 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in peanut butter. Add oats and vanilla; stir until well combined.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let cool until hardened.
